com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu

接口 MaterialMenu

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MaterialMenuBase, MaterialMenuIcon, MaterialMenuIconCompat, MaterialMenuIconToolbar, MaterialMenuView

    public interface MaterialMenu
    API for interaction with MaterialMenuDrawable

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void animatePressedState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
      Animate icon to given state and draw touch circle
      void animateState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
      Animate icon to given state.
      MaterialMenuDrawable getDrawable() 
      MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState getState()
      Return current icon state
      void setColor(int color)
      Set color of icon
      void setInterpolator(android.view.animation.Interpolator interpolator)
      Set interpolator for transformation animations
      void setPressedDuration(int duration)
      Set duration of pressed state circle animation
      void setRTLEnabled(boolean rtlEnabled)
      Enable RTL layout.
      void setState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
      Change icon without animation
      void setTransformationDuration(int duration)
      Set duration of transformation animations
      void setTransformationOffset(MaterialMenuDrawable.AnimationState animationState, float value)

    • 方法详细资料

      • setState

        void setState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
        Change icon without animation
        参数:
        state - new icon state

      • getState

        MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState getState()
        Return current icon state
        返回:
        icon state

      • animateState

        void animateState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
        Animate icon to given state.
        参数:
        state - new icon state

      • animatePressedState

        void animatePressedState(MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState state)
        Animate icon to given state and draw touch circle
        参数:
        state - new icon state

      • setColor

        void setColor(int color)
        Set color of icon
        参数:
        color - new icon color

      • setTransformationDuration

        void setTransformationDuration(int duration)
        Set duration of transformation animations
        参数:
        duration - new animation duration

      • setPressedDuration

        void setPressedDuration(int duration)
        Set duration of pressed state circle animation
        参数:
        duration - new animation duration

      • setInterpolator

        void setInterpolator(android.view.animation.Interpolator interpolator)
        Set interpolator for transformation animations
        参数:
        interpolator - new interpolator

      • setRTLEnabled

        void setRTLEnabled(boolean rtlEnabled)
        Enable RTL layout. Flips all icons horizontally
        参数:
        rtlEnabled - true to enable RTL layout

      • setTransformationOffset

        void setTransformationOffset(MaterialMenuDrawable.AnimationState animationState,
                           float value)
        Manually set a transformation value for an MaterialMenuDrawable.AnimationState
        参数:
        animationState - state to set value in
        value - between MaterialMenuDrawable.TRANSFORMATION_START and MaterialMenuDrawable.TRANSFORMATION_END.

      • getDrawable

        MaterialMenuDrawable getDrawable()
        返回:
        MaterialMenuDrawable to be used for the menu
